metadata.title: CVE-2023-52692 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: scarlett2: Add missing error check to scarlett2_usb_set_config()scarlett2_usb_set_config() calls scarlett2_usb_get() but was notchecking the result. Return the error if it fails rather thancontinuing with an invalid value.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
